creator: agy@netapp.com
text:
It appears to be impossible to host a README.html or README.txt
file on Apache, as it reserves these names to itself.  Very bad.
README.* is an industry standard name for a top-level file in
any software distribution.  This issue makes these files invisible.

Please bring your problem to a user-support forum like
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

Apache certainly doesn't do anything to prevent serving of README files,
although it does omit them from directory listings if the IndexIgnore directive
asks it to.
creator: slive@apache.org
